name: LOGOS Protocol â€” System Entry Point Runtime Manifest
description: Authorized runtime scripts and execution roles after constructive LEM gate. All post-gate init flows must pass through this directory. No new post-gate scripts may bypass this manifest.

post_gate_requirements: Recompile the Coq kernel using an approved script listed below.
Serve or expose the kernel only via approved methods.
Operate only within this directory or allowed runtime roots: START_LOGOS.py, PXL_Gate/, System_Stack/.
prohibited_patterns: No script outside this directory may recompile the Coq kernel directly.
No runtime script may import from JUNK_DRAWER/, _dev/, or unauthorized areas.
No post-gate agent or service may start until a second successful Coq compile is verified here.

pipeline_scripts.role: Flask API exposing Coq recompile and inspection

enforcement.runtime_guard: Violations trigger runtime audit failure in PHASE_2_IDENTITY_AUDIT.
enforcement.notes: This manifest is the source of truth; update as development checkpoints clear.
